title: Tomato and pepper tart
ingredients: ['210g plain flour, sieved', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt, sieved', '125g butter, chopped in small cubes and softened', '2 tablespoons cold water', '1 free range egg, large', '2 teaspoons grainy mustard', '2 to 3 large, ripe tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1/2 to 1 orange or yellow pepper, chopped into 1 to 2cm pieces', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme and chives, chopped finely', '1 teaspoon SteenbergsÂ® Perfect Salt seasoning, or salt and pepper', "125g goat's cheese, finely sliced", '2 tablespoons olive oil']
